price: 135. Katakanlah (Muhammad), “Masing-masing (kita) menanti, maka nantikanlah olehmu! Dan kelak kamu akan mengetahui, siapa yang menempuh jalan yang lurus, dan siapa yang telah mendapat petunjuk.”
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu al-ṣirāṭi al-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
